title: Kaisa builds deaths dance, has Janna as support
body: Guess I'm not allowed to do damage to the adc anymore.  So fun to play against riot.

replies.body: TBH theres no reason to buy BT anymore lol

> [{quoted}](name=Proxy345,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kRK1ZPYU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-04-09T03:09:14.150+0000)
>
> TBH theres no reason to buy BT anymore lol

Basically this.

*Enemy team has a good composition when they are grouped*

"Guys group!"

See it's not the champions that are OP, it's the amount of retards put into a single team.

more like kai'sa builds death dance, you're not allowed to dance alive anymore 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
